Some rare combos for sale.  Stahl and Reulbach are super nice.  The colors on Stahl are pretty stunning.

Prices include shipping and insurance (within the U.S. only) and assume a no-fee payment method.  Thanks for looking!


Stahl Piedmont 42 PSA 3mc $325
Reulbach Piedmont 42 PSA 5mk $500

O'Leary Cycle 460 SGC 30 $325
Street Cycle 460 PSA 2mk $225
